title: Former Neighbours star Bella Heathcote loved working with Hollywood superstar Johnny Depp
text:
Australian actress Bella Heathcote has come a long way from Ramsay Street, and she has the stories to prove it.

The former Neighbours star is now herself a Hollywood star, having worked with some of Tinseltown's finest, including Johnny Depp.

Speaking to Confidential, the 32-year-old has recounted her experience with the A-Lister on the set of the 2012 Tim Burton film Dark Shadows, in which the pair starred.

'He was just absolutely delightful!' On Saturday, former Neighbours star Bella Heathcote (pictured) recalled her 'super cool' experience working with Hollywood superstar Johnny Depp

Bella said of the 56-year-old actor: 'We had quite a few scenes together, I remember thinking he was just absolutely delightful.'

She continued: 'He was so lovely to everyone on set. He was super cool.'

The former soap star's career has gone from strength to strength and she recently starred in the series Strange Angel.

Dark new role: Strange Angel is a dark historical drama and web TV series that airs on CBS All Access (pictured on set). It explore occultism

Strange Angel is a dark historical drama and web TV series that airs on CBS All Access.

It is based on the biography Strange Angel: The Otherworldly Life of Rocket Scientist John Whiteside Parsons by George Pendle, and follows the story of his life.

John or 'Jack' as he became known, was an American rocket engineer who died in 1952 and is said to have experimented with occultism.
